--- In rest-discuss@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Tilkov <stefan.tilkov@...> wrot=
e:

> Here I have to disagree - I don't have any idea what an "official RES=
T  
> project" might be doing.
> 
> Best,
> Stefan

Hi,

I have to second S=
tefan. REST is the name for this architectural style
and with Roy's thesis =
well defined. Not much left to do. We/you could
further investigate archite=
ctures that are so to speak "RESTful"
(follow the style) - but we cannot ca=
ll them REST. Hence a "REST
project" does not make sense.

Regards,
Nicolai=
